00036 #include <sys/types.h>
00037 #include <sys/stat.h>
00038 #include <fcntl.h>
00039 #include <unistd.h>

00041 #include "mpi.h"
00042 
00043 static mode_t mode_dir = S_IRWXU | S_IRWXG;
00044 static MPI_Comm comm = MPI_COMM_WORLD;
00045 
00046 //lbann::mode_dir  = S_IRWXU | S_IRWXG;
00047 //lbann::mode_file = S_IWUSR | S_IRUSR | S_IWGRP | S_IRGRP;
00048 
00049 /* creates directory given in dir (absolute path),
00050  * rank 0 creates directory, all other procs get result via bcast,
00051  * returns 1 if dir was created, 0 otherwise */
00052 int lbann::makedir(const char* dir)
00053 {
00054     // get our rank
00055     int rank;
00056     MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00057 
00058     // have rank 0 create directory
00059     int mkdir_rc;
00060     if (rank == 0) {
00061         mkdir_rc = mkdir(dir, mode_dir);
00062         if (mkdir_rc != 0) {
00063             if (errno == EEXIST) {
00064                 // not an error if the directory already exists
00065                 mkdir_rc = 0;
00066             } else {
00067                 fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: Failed to create directory `%s' (%d: %s) @ %s:%d\n",
00068                         dir, errno, strerror(errno), __FILE__, __LINE__
00069                 );
00070                 fflush(stderr);
00071             }
00072         }
00073     }
00074 
00075     // bcast whether directory was created or not
00076     MPI_Bcast(&mkdir_rc, 1, MPI_INT, 0, comm);
00077 
00078     // return 1 if dir was created successfully
00079     int ret = (mkdir_rc == 0);
00080     return ret;
00081 }
00082 
00083 int lbann::openread(const char* file)
00084 {
00085     // open the file for writing
00086     int fd = open(file, O_RDONLY);
00087     if (fd == -1) {
00088         fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: Failed to open file `%s' (%d: %s) @ %s:%d\n",
00089                 file, errno, strerror(errno), __FILE__, __LINE__
00090         );
00091         fflush(stderr);
00092     }
00093     return fd;
00094 }
00095 
00096 int lbann::closeread(int fd, const char* file)
00097 {
00098    // close file
00099    int close_rc = close(fd);
00100    if (close_rc == -1) {
00101        fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: Failed to close file `%s' (%d: %s) @ %s:%d\n",
00102                file, errno, strerror(errno), __FILE__, __LINE__
00103        );
00104        fflush(stderr);
00105    }
00106 
00107    return close_rc;
00108 }
00109 
00110 int lbann::openwrite(const char* file)
00111 {
00112     // define mode (permissions) for new file
00113     mode_t mode_file = S_IWUSR | S_IRUSR | S_IWGRP | S_IRGRP;
00114 
00115     // open the file for writing
00116     int fd = open(file, O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC, mode_file);
00117     if (fd == -1) {
00118         fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: Failed to create file `%s' (%d: %s) @ %s:%d\n",
00119                 file, errno, strerror(errno), __FILE__, __LINE__
00120         );
00121         fflush(stderr);
00122     }
00123     return fd;
00124 }
00125 
00126 int lbann::closewrite(int fd, const char* file)
00127 {
00128    // fsync file
00129    int fsync_rc = fsync(fd);
00130    if (fsync_rc == -1) {
00131        fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: Failed to fsync file `%s' (%d: %s) @ %s:%d\n",
00132                file, errno, strerror(errno), __FILE__, __LINE__
00133        );
00134        fflush(stderr);
00135    }
00136 
00137    // close file
00138    int close_rc = close(fd);
00139    if (close_rc == -1) {
00140        fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: Failed to close file `%s' (%d: %s) @ %s:%d\n",
00141                file, errno, strerror(errno), __FILE__, __LINE__
00142        );
00143        fflush(stderr);
00144    }
00145 
00146    return close_rc;
00147 }
